name: Human-Machine RPG Authoring Tool
description:
This is a game generation game built on a language model trained on games from https://200wordrpg.github.io/. Results tend to be silly and mostly nonsense, but I've found it very fun to play through and try to point the language model towards something playable.

It is a little bit gigantic unpacked (a little over a gigabyte) because it comes with it's own python.exe with a bunch of quality of life ML libraries installed. It works on at least two windows-10 computers with different CPUs.
